levels.description: Attack Interval <@ba.vup>reduces</> and prioritizes the target with the highest <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Injury</> taken. All allied units within Attack Range receive <@ba.vup>{ep_damage_resistance:0%}</> less <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Injury</>
